author: ThoughtLash
title: I'll be Honest Here...
review:
...this game sucks. I bought it used at GameStop several years ago, with no instructions. Without them (and possibly with, I couldn't find 'em online), it's near-impossible to play. The gameplay is confusing and the terrain is cluttered.

From my "playthrough," I could not complete a single level. The farthest I managed to get was using Kopaka and Lewa, with Gali as a runner up. Everyone else was far too hard. I much prefer the PC version, ah the awesome memories.

I'm going to say, if you can even find this for sale, don't waste your money. I'm holding onto mine simply because it's a BIONICLE game, and I can't sell anything related to BIONICLE. xD
